question: I have heard of a Hadith that there is Barakah or Increase in 3 things….’Rizq’ when we Fast, Wealth when we Travel, and one other thing (I forgot). …
answer:
QUESTION
Please provide me this Hadith along with it?s source. Jazak-Allahu Khairan.
ANSWER


Share:
Sayyiduna Abu Hurayra (Radhiallaahu Anhu) reports that Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, ?Strive in the path of Allah, you will acquire booty (wealth); observe the fast, you will attain good health; and travel, you will become wealthy.?

This Hadith has been recorded by Imaam Tabrani in his Mu?jamul Awsat and Hafiz Munzhiri (RA) as well as Hafiz al-Haythami have classified all it?s narrators as reliable. (refer al-Targheeb vol.2 pg.83; Majmauz-zawaaid vol.3 pg.179)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Muhammad ibn Moulana Haroon Abassommar
FACULTY OF SPECIALTY IN HADITH
